body_html: Thank you again, sq! I tested TensorFlow 1.0 and current version, and check the codes. In TF 1.0, using zeros_initializer won't work because the codes are different, but zeros_initializer() has no problem. For consistency's sake within the Vafiables document, I still believe it would be a good thing to point out both circumstances works or use either.

body: Thank you again, sq! I tested TensorFlow 1.0 and current version, and check the codes.  In TF 1.0, using `zeros_initializer` won't work because the codes are different, but `zeros_initializer()` has no problem. For consistency's sake within the [Vafiables](https://tensorflow.google.cn/programmers_guide/variables) document, I still believe it would be a good thing to point out both circumstances works or use either.
